attributes.action: Abandon the Assisted Dying Bill and focus on offering superb palliative care
attributes.additional_details: "Every life matters, especially at its most vulnerable moments. Let’s stand together for compassionate care, not shortcuts. By focusing on excellent end-of-life healthcare, we can honor the dignity of those who are dying, providing them with love, comfort, and support in their final days. Sign the petition to abandon the Assisted Dying Bill and advocate for a healthcare system that values life and offers hope to the very end."
attributes.background: Stop the Assisted Dying Bill!!! By focusing on excellent end-of-life healthcare, we can honor the dignity of those who are dying, providing them with love, comfort, and support in their final days.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701742
